name: Stop Time Card
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 41.  A danmaku (bullet hell) style game mixed with a turn-based card game.  

Play in browser, or download for a better experience.  You can play against the CPU or a friend. 

I've also uploaded a set of assets from the game, free to use in any project!

Known bugs:

  • Win/Lose condition text is bugged.
  • Linux version needs permission rewriting, and OSX version needs nwjs versions folder replaced.  I'll fix those and reupload when I'm not exhausted).
